      • getSymbolToLine

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Integer> getSymbolToLine()
        returns an a map of the line numbers where each symbol appears. each symbol is an integer. Ex: Line 1 contains symbols 1-15. Used to assign line numbers to variables.
        Returns:
        a Map where the key is the symbol number and the value is the line
